title: Short-Term Intensive Training on University Research Information Utilization for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information literacy skills and understanding of educational environments
context.additional_context: Mobile-based education for strengthening social studies research competencies among pre-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can select education-related research topics using digital resources from university libraries.
Learners apply a three-step verification process to identify credible information sources in mobile environments.
Learners reconstruct research information considering diverse learner needs according to UDL principles and apply it to instructional design.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
